ðŸ“– Summary: Quiet is a decentralized, peer-to-peer team chat application built on Tor. It offers end-to-end encryption and eliminates the need for a central server, providing a private alternative to traditional team communication platforms like Slack and Discord. Users can create communities and communicate directly with each other, ensuring data privacy and control.
